review: Works as designed! Great device and portable. Only negative is the power connection/cable is awkward and difficult to manage if you have space allocated for power.
author: Mitch Mitchell

review: Seems to work awesome but you'd have to ask my kids (16&18) I can't get near it!
author: Jon M. Jaquin

review: Can't wait to get amazon prime
author: Henry

review: Slick, versatile, and easy to use. The Fire Stick exceeded my expectations. There is so much that you can do with it. I love it.
author: Michael goulet

review: Turned in my cable TV subscription for the Fire TV Stick. Love it: great picture, good selection from my Amazon Prime. Now if only I could tap into current newscasts with it.
author: C. K. Antrim

review: Great invention, easy to set up and operate. Good app selections.  Keep up the good inventions.
author: John Belair

review: Love it so easy to use
author: Shopper

review: This is a great item to purchase. I bought two of them!
